OGLFT::Face::FaceData

Detailed Description

We allow a Face to be constructed either from a file name or passed in as an already opened FreeType FT_Face. In the case of the later (already opened), we don't close the FT_Face on destruction. This way you can share FT_Faces between related OGLFT faces. Also, we're experimenting with being able to use multiple FT_Faces in a single OGLFT Face, so this is represented as a data structure.
